title: Keeps taking my gold bars.
text: I exchange my gold bars for extra lives but I never get them. I also made a purchase on the app but didn’t get any of the stuff. It did charge me tho. Besides it just taking my money the game is alright.

title: I want to play by myself
text: I like this game for the most part. A few bonuses when you play can be fun, but when you’re waiting for the game to stop playing by itself it loses its fun for me! I want to play the game!

title: No Haptics Support on iPhone 11 Pro Max
text: Used to love this game, especially when you added the vibrations to the gameplay. Now that I’ve upgraded to the 11, the haptics option is no longer available. It’s annoying & has taken away from my experience. Don’t understand why it hasn’t been fixed?

title: Obsessed....but
text: I have been playing the Crush for many years.  I love the game, but don't want to have to spend money every time I get a Nightmarishly Hard Level. The recent changes make that almost impossible.  When you're collecting candy, you used to earn boosts which you could use when you wanted to.  Now they are just for 15 minutes. But you're getting them just as you have used all of your lives!  Please take the time limit off.  I really need the boost sometimes.

title: Worked fine until...
text: The audio stopped working.

title: Great distraction
text: Candy crush is great for that quick 5 minute break to give you a breather a moment away from the hustle busses. Just back to being a kid , at the arcade, for a few moments a day.

title: Glitch In My GAME ‼️
text: I was only on level 700 and now my game won’t let me play 😭 it’s showing I have 164,498 lives and 300,000 boosters. I NEED THIS FIXED. I haven’t been able to play in two days 😭😭. Once it’s fixed, I’ll give it FIVE STARS ‼️

title: Ruined game!!!   Thieves!!!!
text: Horrible game!!!   Timed boosters for sugar drop rewards are worthless!!!  What feature will we lose next?   Now they're charging extra for gold bars.  Robbers!

title: Contests and such don’t work, too hard to win
text: This has become the most BORING game in upper levels, the ‘contests’ do not work and time out long before you get a prize. I also hate the ‘players’ in the rankings since no idea who they are or if they even exist. Get 'players' out of rankings and contests!!!

title: App not working, can’t even get it to open.

title: Love this Game
text: I have been playing for years. It definitely passes the time. But the games are inconsistent from device to devise. I’m a level behind on one than the other. Also the sounds, not music, doesn’t work sometimes. I often have to delete the app and download again. Will this be fixed? Other than that it’s cool. Gracias.

title: Glitches
text: Recently, the game is full of glitches. Won’t connect to internet. Features disappearing or not functioning properly. App needs serious maintenance/attention. Facebook help site gets no response from CC admin.  Boring.

title: Extremely 🥵
text: Like playing but this game had my phone on 🔥 I have a iPhone 📲 XS MAX. I noticed when playing my phone was getting hot. I overlooked it && cut my phone off. Tried playing again && the same thing. I can’t have a game on my phone when it’s doing this. So of course I uninstalled your game. SORRY NOT SORRY 🤷🏾‍♀️

title: Ad Crush
text: If you love watching ads, you’ll love Candy Crush Saga. If you don’t love watching ads, you’ll be frustrated by the lengths the makers of this game take to coheres you into watching ads. Never mandatory, but ingeniously necessary, should you wish to complete a difficult level before the next ice age. Yes, it’s a fun game, but I always feel duped after playing it.

title: Great time

title: Candy crush rock

title: THE BEST GAME EVA!
text:
Hi I am currently on level 2745 and I must say that I LOVE THIS GAME!! Can you add more planets to the Dexter event and I update every week, so plz make this game better to impress me. I also play every day and once I got jackpot on the spin wheel. All you have to do is when the spinner goes on the wrapped and striped booster you win jackpot, or the coconut wheel. (a very common prize) it's cool that you got more than 5k levels!
Also, one question. So, I play Candy Crush Friends also, but why does it glitch me out in jelly and soda? Fix that 2
Please add this to the game!
P.S. I have been noticing super stars does not count on your "Average stars from last 10 levels".

title: DELAY THE HIGHLIGHTED HINTS!! ASKING AGAIN😫

The game is still a five but do not need the hints!
